Verses: 1 janangale, Neengal Ellaarum Idhaik Kelungal.
2 boomiyin Kudigale, Siriyorum Periyorum Aisuvariyavaangalum Eliyavargalumaagiya Neengal Ellaarum Egamaaich Sevikodungal.
3 en Vaai Gnaanaththaip Pesum; En Irudhayam Unarvaith Dhiyaanikkum.
4 en Seviyai Uvamaimozhikkuch Saaiththu, En Maraiporulaich Suramandalaththinmel Velippaduththuven.
5 ennaith Thodarugiravargaludaiya Akkiramam Ennaich Soozhndhukollun Theengunaatkalil, Naan Payappadavendiyadhenna?
6 thangal Selvaththai Nambi Thangal Thiralaana Aisuvariyaththinaal Perumaipaaraattugira,
7 oruvanaavadhu, Than Sagodharan Azhivaik Kaanaamal Ini Endraikkum Uyirodirukkumpadi,
8 evvidhaththinaalaavadhu Avanai Meettukkollavum, Avanimiththam Meetkumporulai Dhevanukkuk Kodukkavunkoodaadhe.
9 avargal Aaththumameetpu Migavum Arumaiyaayirukkiradhu; Adhu Orupodhum Mudiyaadhu.
10 gnaanigalum Mariththu, Agngnaanigalum Nirmoodarum Egamaai Azhindhu, Thangal Aatdhiyai Matravargalukku Vaiththuppogiradhaik Kaangiraan.

11 thangal Veedugal Niththiyakaalamaagavum, Thangal Vaasasthalangal Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaagavum Irukkumenbadhu Avargal Ullaththin Abippiraayam; Avargal Thangal Naamangalaith Thangal Nilangalukkuth Tharikkiraargal.
12 aagilum Ganamporundhiyavanaayirukkira Manushan Nilaiththirukkiradhillai; Azhindhupogum Mirugangalukku Oppaayirukkiraan.
13 idhudhaan Avargal Vazhi, Idhudhaan Avargal Paiththiyam; Aagilum Avargal Sandhadhiyaar Avargal Sollai Mechchikkollugiraargal. (selaa.)

14 aattumandhaiyaippola Paadhaalaththile Kidaththappadugiraargal; Maranam Avargalai Meyndhupodum; Semmaiyaanavargal Adhikaalaiyil Avargalai Aandukolvaargal; Avargal Thangal Vaasasthalaththil Nilaiththirukkakkoodaadhapadi Avargaludaiya Roobaththaip Paadhaalam Azhikkum.
15 aanaalum Dhevan En Aaththumaavaip Paadhaalaththin Vallamaikkuth Thappuviththu Meetpaar, Avar Ennai Etrukkolvaar. (selaa.)
16 oruvan Aisuvariyavaanaagi, Avan Veettin Magimai Perugumpodhu, Nee Bayappadaadhe.
17 avan Marikkumpodhu Ondrum Kondupovadhillai; Avan Magimai Avanaip Pinbatrich Selvadhumillai.
18 avan Uyirodirukkaiyil Than Aaththumaavai Vaazhththinaalum: Nee Unakku Nanmaiyai Naadinaai Endru Manushar Avanaip Pugazhndhaalum,
19 avan Endrendraikkum Velichchaththaik Kaanaadha Than Pidhaakkalin Sandhadhiyaich Seruvaan.
20 ganam Porundhinavanaayirundhum Arivillaadha Manushan Azhindhupogum Mirugangalukku Oppaayirukkiraan.
